scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist/data')){fs.mkdirSync('dist/data', {recursive: true});} console.log('Data directory ensured');"
scripts.build: tsc && npm run verify-build && npm run copy-data
scripts.verify-build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const requiredFiles=['dist/data/persistentStorage.js','dist/sockets/signaling.js','dist/server.js']; requiredFiles.forEach(f=>{if(!fs.existsSync(f)){console.error('Missing required file:', f); process.exit(1);}else{console.log('âœ“', f);}}); console.log('Build verification complete!');"
scripts.copy-data: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist/data')){fs.mkdirSync('dist/data', {recursive: true});} console.log('Data directory ensured');"
